subject: From The Desk Of Mr.Charles
body:
From The Desk Of Mr.Charles R. Alabi
Head Of Payment Unit
Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC)
No. 15A, Awolowo Road, Ikoyi, Lagos, Nigeria.
+234-703-190-3892
Dear Sir,
Greetings to you this beautiful Thursday Morning. How are you and your Lovely family doing today? Hope they are in the best of good health.
Meanwhile We write to let you know the report reaching us from the Presidency as regards your Over-Due payment which have not been claimed by you till date. They have instructed us to cancel all the Outstanding Payment and present the Payment files to them by next week Tuesday` being the 13th Of February 2024.
As stated from above, failure to comply to the directives  and claim your funds before the date, we will assume that you are no longer interested to receive your funds and there will be no any other option than to go ahead and remit the total sum to the CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA as requested by the Presidency.
The GOOD-NEWS is that your Fund is ready for Transfer into your Bank Account, once this Board confirm the requirement FEE need from you, to enable us reprogramming your information in our Database and proceed to obtain the necessary Certificates on your behalf in order to exonerate you from any form of investigations or interrogation and to authenticate the fact that the funds has no links whatsoever with either drugs or terrorism,in line with the  Financial Regulatory Transaction Laws, so that your Fund will be release into your provided Bank Account immediately without further delay. I AM GIVEN YOU MY WORDS AND THEY ARE MY VOW/BOND.
Once again I will advise  you to kindly go ahead today and transfer the (US$155) via Account Below:
Account Name :K. F.
address :  Elizabeth New Jersey 07206.
Bank: TD Bank
Routing number 031201360
Account 441678XXXX
Swift NRTHUS33XXX
Bank Address 37 W St George Avenue Roselle NJ 07203 USA.
Finally as soon as you send the FEE, kindly the send the Payment Slip immediately and you should act fast to enable us proceed and obtain the necessary Certificates on your behalf as soon as possible and commence the transfer of your funds into your Bank Account without further delay.I hope you understand all I have stated and I will be very glad for your kind understanding and co-operation.
Thanks and We anticipate hearing from you positively today to enable us proceed and serve you better.
Warm regards,
Mr.Charles. R. Alabi.
Head Of Payment Unit
Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC)

subject: Re:   From The Desk Of Mr.Charles
body:
Dear R. Alabi,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this email finds you well. I appreciate the update regarding my payment, although I must admit that I wasn't aware of any pending funds. Could you please provide me with more details about the nature of this payment? How did it come about?

I understand the urgency mentioned in your email, but before proceeding, I would like to ensure that everything is legitimate and in accordance with the necessary regulations. Can you please clarify what fee needs to be paid and why it is required? Additionally, could you provide some documentation or proof to support your claims?

I apologize for my cautious approach, but it's important for me to have all the information before taking any further steps. Thank you for your understanding.

Best wishes,
Wilfred

subject: From The Desk Of Mr.Charles R. Alabi
body:
From The Desk Of Mr.Charles R. Alabi
Head Of Payment Unit
Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC)
No. 15A, Awolowo Road, Ikoyi, Lagos, Nigeria.
 +234-703-190-3892

Dear Sir,
This is to acknowledge the receipt of your email message and I  have gone through the contents of your message and the contents was well understood and noted  but I want to use this medium to let you know that you should send the token of $205 with your IDENTIFICATION AND INFORMATION as requested as soon as possible, to enable us reprogramming your information in our Data Base and proceed to the necessary documentation on your behalf,  in order to exonerate you from any form of investigations or interrogation and to authenticate the fact that the funds has no links whatsoever with either drugs or terrorism,in line with the  Financial Regulatory Transaction Laws,so that your funds will be released to you immediately without further delay.
Meanwhile you are advised to re-confirm the below information in order to avoid any error or mistake during the transaction:
Full Name:.................................................................................................................Contact Address:.....................................................................................................Your Private Telephone Number:.............................................................................A Copy Of Your Identification:................................................................................
And in view of the above instructions,you have to indicate your preferred mode of payment. The options available to you are as follows:
(1) WIRE TRANSFER THROUGH OUR BANK TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT.(2) THROUGH ATM CARD

Please as soon as  we  Confirm the above information with the  $155  meant for obtaining the necessary certificates on your behalf, so that  you will not be questioned  from any Authorities here or in your Country after the transaction is made. I hope you understand all I have stated and I will be very glad for your kind understanding and co-operation.


We write to let you know that your funds  is in an Escrow/Bond account and with a hard covered insurance policy  and you should understand that there is no possibility to deduct any fee from the principle  as it's against our ethics for outstanding fee hence your funds are bonded into Law with proper documentation and insurance covered as it has been made mandatory by the Board Directors that on no account the  charges will be deducted until the fund is released to you.
Finally I swear and giving you my words that once the requirement fee is confirmed,your Approved Funds will be released to you within the next 72hrs. Take note, this is my assurance and words, they are my Vow/Bond.
Thanks and We anticipate hearing from you positively today to enable us proceed and serve you better.

Warm regards,
Mr.Charles. R. Alabi.
Head Of Payment Unit
Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC)

subject: Re: From The Desk Of Mr.Charles R. Alabi
body:
Dear Mr. Alabi,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that my funds are released to me without any delay or complications.

I understand that you require a token from me in order to proceed with the necessary actions on my behalf. Could you please provide more details about what this token is and how I can obtain it? I want to make sure that I follow the correct procedure.

Regarding the preferred mode of payment, I would like to explore both options available to me - wire transfer through our banks and through an ATM card. Could you please explain the advantages and disadvantages of each option? This will help me make an informed decision.

I also want to confirm that once the fee is approved, my funds will be released within the next timeframe you mentioned. Can you please provide more specific details about this timeframe?

Thank you again for your assistance, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wilfred
